Source.Name: cinnamon-menus
Source.Description: cinnamon-menus contains the libcinnamon-menu library, the layout configuration files for the Cinnamon menu, as well as a simple menu editor. The libcinnamon-menu library implements the "Desktop Menu Specification" from freedesktop.org.

Package.Name: cinnamon-menus
Package.Description: cinnamon-menus contains the libcinnamon-menu library, the layout configuration files for the Cinnamon menu, as well as a simple menu editor. The libcinnamon-menu library implements the "Desktop Menu Specification" from freedesktop.org.
